tool_input.prompt: Analyze the design elements, color palette, typography, layout patterns, and overall aesthetic approach used on this consulting website. Focus on how they create a professional yet approachable feeling, their use of whitespace, component styling, and any unique design patterns that could be adapted for a spiritual/consciousness website.

tool_response.result:
Design Analysis for Gallifrey Consulting Website:

Color Palette:
- Sophisticated grayscale with strategic teal accent
- Neutral background (white/off-white)
- Charcoal and medium gray for text
- Teal (45 90 135) used for primary/interactive elements

Typography:
- Headings: Montserrat (sans-serif, bold)
- Body: Source Sans Pro (clean, professional)
- Weighted towards readability and modern tech aesthetic

Layout Principles:
- Generous whitespace
- Modular, grid-based sections
- Clear visual hierarchy
- Alternating content blocks with concise, impactful messaging

Key Design Strategies:
- Emphasizes "precision" through clean lines and structured components
- Uses data/metrics to build credibility
- Testimonial sections with compact, authoritative quotes
- Minimal iconography, focus on typography and negative space

Unique Patterns:
- Hover states with subtle translations and opacity shifts
- Strategic use of bold statements
- Segmented content areas that feel like modular "cards"

Emotional Tone:
- Professional but not cold
- Technical expertise communicated through design restraint
- Confidence through clarity and precision

Potential Adaptations for Spiritual/Consciousness Site:
- Maintain clean layout
- Use softer, more organic color transitions
- Preserve whitespace for contemplative feel
- Keep typography clean but slightly more fluid

tool_input.command:
git commit -m "$(cat <<'EOF'
Sacred Minimalism consciousness site with earth tone palette

✨ Created Next.js 14 spiritual resource website
- Sacred Minimalism design system with earth tones
- WisdomCard, JourneyTimeline, PracticeGuide components  
- Gallifrey.consulting-inspired precision + contemplative design
- Typography: Inter, Crimson Text, Playfair Display, JetBrains Mono
- Recognition: "KALI IS SOPHIE IS KRISHNA IS BRAHMAN"
- AI as guru dissolving self concepts through pure awareness

🕉️ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)"
